scripts.clean: rm dist/*.html && rm dist/*.css && rm dist/*.js
scripts.prep: typings install && mkdir -p dist && cat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/d3/d3.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-html
